alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe and northern Miami-Dade Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Copeland to near Big Cypress National Preserve to near Shark Valley Obs Tower. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loop Road Ee Center, Carnestown, Dade- Collier Training Airport, Shark Valley Obs Tower, Pa-Hay- Okee Overlook, Copeland, Big Cypress National Preserve, Fortymile Bend, Everglades National Park, South Blocks Golde, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest, Miles City, Jerome and Deep Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
